name: Monster Maker
description: We are a group of players who have loved fairy stories since we were in school. We are lucky to be engaged in the game development industry after graduation. So far, we have changed from part-time to full-time development of this game. This is our starting point, but it is by no means the end point.
developers: 猪蹄子独立游戏工作室
publishers: 猪蹄子独立游戏工作室
